plugins.name: Illustrator Importer
plugins.description:
‚ú® Import Adobe Illustrator into Figma & Figjam

Import your adobe illustrator files (.ai) directly into Figma as vectors with fully editable text layers.


ü™Ñ How to use:

  1. Run the plugin.
  2. Browse or drag-and-drop your "ai" file.
  3. Preview your illustrator file and check all the fonts in use.
  4. (Optional) Install ‚Äúfonts in use‚Äù if you want to maintain the same fonts used in the ".ai" file.
  5. Press the ‚Äúimport‚Äù button, and you‚Äôll have your illustrator file directly in Figma as a fully editable vector.


üß© Features:

  1. Import adobe illustrator (.ai) as a vector file without rasterizing.
  2. Find and list all fonts used in the "ai" file.
  3. Fully editable text layers capability.
  4. Limitless usage in Figma & FigJam.
  5. No registration required.


‚ùì Frequently asked questions:

What are import credits?

Import credits are units that users can purchase to import illustrator files. Each file consumes a certain number of credits based on the file size.


How are import credits calculated?

Import credits are calculated based on a "pay as you go" model, where you only pay for the credits you use. The calculation depends on the size of the illustrator file you want to import. The bigger the file size is, the more credits it will consume.

Here's how it works:

  1. Files between 0 and 50 MB: 1 credit
  2. Files between 51 and 100 MB: 2 credits
  3. Files between 101 and 150 MB: 3 credits
  4. Maximum file size allowed: 150 MB (which requires 3 credits)

Note: Only successful imported files are counted.


Can I purchase multiple packages at the same time?

Yes, you can buy import credits in packages that suit your needs. We offer different options to accommodate various usage levels. You can find all available packages here.


How do I know how many import credits I need?

When you upload your illustrator file, we'll automatically calculate the required import credits based on the file size. You'll see this information before proceeding in the plugin‚Äôs UI.


What happens if I don't have enough credits?

If you attempt to import an illustrator file but you don't have enough credits, we will notify you and provide options to purchase additional credits in the plugin‚Äôs UI.


Are there any limitations on file size or number of imports?

The maximum file size allowed is 150 MB and there's no limit on the number of imports you can perform as long as you have sufficient credits.


Is there an expiry date or time limit on credits?

No, there is no expiry date or time limit on credits. You can use them whenever you need to import files without worrying about expiration.


Can I try the plugin for free?

Yes, we offer 2 free credits where you can try the plugin for free. This allows you to try and experience the functionality of the plugin risk-free.


Can I import illustrator files with multiple artboards using the Figma plugin?

Currently, we don‚Äôt support importing multiple artboards. However, we're actively working on adding this feature in a future update.


üì© Feedback and support:

Your feedback is important to us! For comments, inquiries or assistance, please reach out to us at support@figmats.com


üí≠ Contact us:

Join our community for the latest updates, practical tutorial, future announcements and daily inspiration.

plugins.name: All Hands Mockup Generator | MetaLab x Nappy
plugins.description:
Diversify your product mockups with the All Hands Mockups.


This plugin allows you to drop your designs into one of several hands in two easy steps. Simply choose your frame, choose a hand, and voil√†, you have a beautiful (and inclusive) mockup to show off your work.


This plugin is free to all Figma users.


Devices:

  • iPhone X


Hands:

  • BIPOC ‚úÖ
  • Gender fluid ‚úÖ
  • Body positive ‚úÖ
  • Age inclusive ‚úÖ

 

Notes:

  • The plugin does not support Safari.
  • For best results, frames should be iPhone X aspect ratio (375x812). 
  • The plugin will only see top-level frames.
  • Images are processed client side. Loading time could be impacted by other programs running on your machine, like video recording.
  • We introduce additional layers that add effects to make the mockup look more realistic. These layers are editable so you can customize to your preference once the mockup is created.

 

To see the full collection of All Hands photos, visit: nappy.co/all-hands

plugins.name: Figma to Wix Studio
plugins.description:
Design in Figma, go further on Wix Studio

Transform your Figma designs into advanced, high-converting websites with Wix Studio, the platform for agencies and enterprises.


Learn more at https://www.wix.com/studio/figmatowixstudio

Watch the tutorial https://www.wix.com/studio/academy/tutorials/how-to-export-figma-designs-to-wix-studio

Check out best practices guidelines https://www.wix.com/studio/academy/guides/exporting-designs-from-figma-to-wix-studio

Design from optimized wireframes https://www.figma.com/community/file/1383513758951586919/wireframe-kit


How to use the Figma to Wix Studio plugin


1. Install the plugin

Once installed, click Get Started in Figma, copy the file URL and go to Wix Studio where you‚Äôll see the option to Import from Figma under Tools.


2. Prepare your Figma file

To achieve a 1:1 result, start by matching the width of the Figma frame to the editing size on Studio. Check out more best practices.


3. Export to Wix Studio

Top-level frames are imported as full pages and frames as sections. We recommend starting with styles (typography and colors) to maintain design consistency.


4. Bring your designs to life

Explore Wix Studio‚Äôs no-code animations, built-in business & AI solutions, agency management tools and more‚Äîit‚Äôs yours to experiment with.

accepted.name: Wix Studio
accepted.description: Wix Studio is the web creation platform used by agencies and enterprises to deliver outstanding designs with exceptional efficiency.

plugins.tagline: Convert your designs into Wix Studio site

plugins.name: 3D Shape Generator
plugins.description:
Make 3D shapes right inside of figma!

Create cubes or cuboids as solid fill or wireframe shapes.

Shapes are made of 6 vectors representing each side of the shape allowing you to modify, move or delete faces of the shape as you need.


Features

  1. 8 3D shapes
  2. Solid color faces OR Wireframe (stroke only)
  3. Length, Width, Height parameters
  4. Color picker
  5. Color randomizer
  6. Perspective selector (Isometric, Dimetric, Trimetric)


Thank you for trying the plugin. Please let me know what I can do to make it more useful for you.

plugins.name: Codelessly - Figma to Websites and Apps (Figma to Code, Figma to Flutter, HTML, CSS)
plugins.description:
Codelessly helps you convert designs into working apps and websites instantly!


Get started at https://codelessly.com


No AutoLayout required!

Codelessly is different from other tools and does not require designs to be "formatted" as AutoLayout to work.


Codelessly gives you a full featured editor that implements 85% of the Figma API spec so you can make edits directly inside Codelessly, instead of jumping back and forth.


Publish Designs as Working Apps and Websites

After you import your designs into Codelessly, you can press the publish button and have your designs go live immediately! 


You'll receive a working URL to see your design running as a working app or website.


Generate Code that Developers Love

Codelessly generates high quality, production ready code by default. On top of that, you can customize the code that is generated to match your style and development environment.


Codelessly was built by developers, for developers!


How to Use

To use the Codelessly Plugin, get started at https://codelessly.com
plugins.tagline: Convert designs into working UI, Apps, and Websites.

- Export compressed SVG assets


Free Image Compressor

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

 

Q: Will you be able to see my files when I use your Figma plugin?

A: No, we don't see your files. We prioritize user privacy and do not access or view any of your files while using our Figma plugin.

 

Q: Do you save my files on your server?

A: No, we do not save your files on our server. We understand the importance of data security and have implemented measures to ensure that your files remain confidential.

 

Q: How are my files protected from unauthorized access?

A: All files processed through our Figma plugin are encrypted to ensure their security. We utilize industry-standard encryption protocols to safeguard your data and protect it from unauthorized access.

 

Q: How do you handle file compression?

A: Our Figma plugin leverages the computational power of our CPUs to perform file compression.

 

Q: Is the compression process secure?

A: Yes, the compression process is secure. We employ robust encryption methods during the compression process to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of your files. We prioritize data security to provide a safe user experience.

 

Q: Are there any external parties that may have access to my files?

A: No, there are no external parties that have access to your files. We handle the compression process within our Figma plugin using our servers CPUs processing power. Your files remain encrypted and secure throughout the entire process.



üìû Support

If you have any questions or encounter issues while using Compressify, please don't hesitate to contact us via our Twitter handle: https://twitter.com/Compressifyio. As a new plugin, we're committed to helping you troubleshoot and resolve any problems as quickly as possible.

plugins.description:
Variables are now available! Hurray!

Stop manually adding all your styles; instead, use this plugin to spend more time playing with aliases, modes, and updating your design system components.


Only compatible with Color styles (solid and transparent).


How to use it:

  1. Open the plugin
  2. (Optional) Choose a name for your new collection
  3. (Optional) Use first-level of groups to create modes
  4. (Optional) Link styles to the variables created
  5. Click "Convert Styles into Variables"
  6. And voil√†!


If you want to split your color styles across modes, please move your file from your drafts to a paid external team, or upload it to a team in another organization.

Access over 130 high-quality Sections, 6,800+ Components, and 160,000+ open-source Icons with an instant Drag and Drop.

plugins.name: Dating
plugins.description:
Dating provides two helpful commands for working with dates in Figma.


The first command `Dating > Create Calendar` lets you quickly generate a calendar for a chosen month and year. It will generate a set of components on the first run for the current page and then reuse those components if you generate a second calendar. Great for mocking up date pickers and date range pickers.


The second command `Dating > Relative Dates` lets you quickly copy common relative time frames to your clipboard. All relative dates will be generated from the current day. This is great for mocking up date inputs and times where you want to show a set of common date ranges.

plugins.name: Humaaans Illustrations by Iconduck
plugins.description:
Humaaans Illustrations is an illustration set of 79 designs. It's exclusively made up of color illustrations. It's been open sourced with the license: Creative Commons Zero v1.0 Universal (CC0). All illustrations can be used for personal & commercial purposes.


The focus in this illustration library is on:

  • Bodies and heads
  • Clothing illustrations
  • Mobility and accessibility illustrations


These illustrations are particularly useful for putting together avatars with the different styles and aesthetics that match your team.


While these are illustrations (as opposed to icons), they can be used in a similar way as icons. They're just a bit more expressive.


About the license:

The CC0 license is one of the most flexible open source licenses. It allows you to do whatever you'd like with these illustrations.


Plugin features:

  • Drag and drop any illustrations
  • Search through them all instantly
  • Click any illustration to add it your design


Coming soon:

  • Save your favorite illustrations
  • View your search history
  • View your embed history

plugins.name: Lottielab - Figma to Lottie Animation
plugins.description:
Lottielab is the most comprehensive tool to animate your Figma designs, add interactive components and export seamlessly to Lottie, GIF, 4K .mp4 or .tgs for your websites, apps and marketing purposes.


ü™Ñ Features:


  1. Animate Figma Designs: Easily turn static designs into animations with just a few clicks. Animate your user interfaces for apps, websites, landing pages and micro-interactions and marketing assets for social media, ads or video.
  2. Add Interactivity: Transform your static designs into interactive animations‚Äîno coding required. Add states and events and create production-ready interactive animations that are perfect for web, mobile apps, and more.
  3. Preserve Design Integrity: The plugin maintains the structure of your Figma file. Supports gradients, masks, text, drop shadows, blur, vector paths, shapes, frames, images and more! Your designs will look just as they do in Figma.
  4. Preview Animations: See real-time previews of your animations within Figma before exporting.
  5. Multiple Export Formats: Export to video (up to 4k .mp4), GIF, Lottie JSON and .tgs!
  6. Handoff your animation directly to developers, marketing team or other stakeholders.


üõ†Ô∏è How to Use:

  1. Install the Lottielab Figma Plugin from the Figma community. Select the design element you want to animate. This could be anything from buttons to icons or even an entire design.
  2. Export to the Lottielab editor.
  3. Animate or add Interactivity. Use Lottielab‚Äôs built-in features to add states, triggers, and events like hover or click effects.
  4. Export your animations: Once your animation is ready, export it in your preferred format (Lottie JSON for developers, GIF, or MP4 for marketing and websites).


Resources

  1. Tutorial: How to Turn Any Figma Design into an Interactive Animation.
  2. Connect with other designers in our Discord community.


üó£Ô∏è Feedback & Support: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out for comments, inquiries, or assistance at support@lottielab.com.


üì± Find Us Online: Instagram ¬∑ Twitter ¬∑ LinkedIn
plugins.tagline: Animate your Figma designs, add Interactivity and export to Lottie, GIF or mp4.

108937.name: Lottielab - Figma to Lottie Animation
108937.description:
Lottielab is the most comprehensive tool to animate your Figma designs, add interactive components and export seamlessly to Lottie, GIF, 4K .mp4 or .tgs for your websites, apps and marketing purposes.


ü™Ñ Features:


  1. Animate Figma Designs: Easily turn static designs into animations with just a few clicks. Animate your user interfaces for apps, websites, landing pages and micro-interactions and marketing assets for social media, ads or video.
  2. Add Interactivity: Transform your static designs into interactive animations‚Äîno coding required. Add states and events and create production-ready interactive animations that are perfect for web, mobile apps, and more.
  3. Preserve Design Integrity: The plugin maintains the structure of your Figma file. Supports gradients, masks, text, drop shadows, blur, vector paths, shapes, frames, images and more! Your designs will look just as they do in Figma.
  4. Preview Animations: See real-time previews of your animations within Figma before exporting.
  5. Multiple Export Formats: Export to video (up to 4k .mp4), GIF, Lottie JSON and .tgs!
  6. Handoff your animation directly to developers, marketing team or other stakeholders.


üõ†Ô∏è How to Use:

  1. Install the Lottielab Figma Plugin from the Figma community. Select the design element you want to animate. This could be anything from buttons to icons or even an entire design.
  2. Export to the Lottielab editor.
  3. Animate or add Interactivity. Use Lottielab‚Äôs built-in features to add states, triggers, and events like hover or click effects.
  4. Export your animations: Once your animation is ready, export it in your preferred format (Lottie JSON for developers, GIF, or MP4 for marketing and websites).


Resources

  1. Tutorial: How to Turn Any Figma Design into an Interactive Animation.
  2. Connect with other designers in our Discord community.


üó£Ô∏è Feedback & Support: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out for comments, inquiries, or assistance at support@lottielab.com.


üì± Find Us Online: Instagram ¬∑ Twitter ¬∑ LinkedIn
108937.tagline: Animate your Figma designs, add Interactivity and export to Lottie, GIF or mp4.

plugins.name: Emoji ‚ô° Reactions
plugins.description:
With Emoji ‚ô° Reactions, you can leave emoji, stickies and feedback though a variety of responses directly in your Figma documents in real time. Celebrate your teammates' work! ...or troll them with panache.


Emoji ‚ô° Reactions includes: emoji stickers, live emoji reactions, sticky notes, and chat bubbles. 


Enjoy!


For maximum efficiency, add a Keyboard Shortcut for the Figma Desktop App

  1. Mac: Open System Preferences ‚ñ∏ Keyboard ‚ñ∏ Shortcuts ‚ñ∏ App Shortcuts. 
  2. Add "Emoji Reactions" (for Figma / All Apps) and set it to "Cmd-Opt-M" (recommended)
  3. Emote with abandon.


Source Code: https://github.com/alcor/figma-emoji-reactions

Insert all 120+ illustrations from the illustrations.co open-source library, directly in your Figma and FigJam files as SVG/Vector.

plugins.name: Search
plugins.description:
Navigate across your Figma document by its text content. Also you can tag arbitrary nodes of your document with your custom tags and navigate based on this tags

You can navigate to any page of your current document.
If you have a small document, you can turn on "Reindex on search" and always search based on the most resent search content. Otherwise, you can index your text document manually and then instantly search, using saved index.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

When opened plugin window:
Index your document using "Reindex" button 
or turn on "Index on search" toggle.

Then enter text fragment you want to look for to the "Search" input
and push Enter.

Then all the results appear underneath search control and 
clicking them you will be navigated to the corresponding node in your document.

If you want to add tags to your document nodes than you should open "tags" tab. 
There you can create tags with "Add tags" text field.
Select some group of nodes and their tags will be shown under "Current tags" caption.

If you want to search by tags navigate back to "search" tab and click on the corresponding tag button.

plugins.name: Annotate it!
plugins.description:
Annotate it! makes it easy to annotate your wireframes and/or designs the smart way. Simply select a frame and click Add New to create annotations automagically.


  • Select individual frames (Supports Sections)
  • üéâ Toggle annotations visibility per page üéâ
  • Rename frames (only in the plugin)
  • Drag to reorder
  • Markdown text for smart formatting
  • Smart annotation marker placement
  • Assign a color for various intents
  • Change the size of the markers to your needs
  • Update, Edit, Delete annotations and Annotate it! reorders your annotations automatically


We are now on Discord...join us at:

https://discord.gg/PmFJGPjMDw


‚Äî


How does it work?


  • Select a frame on your Figma page or a frame inside a section to add annotation to.
  • Click Create annotation button to add an annotation to the selected frame.
  • Select a color for your marker if you‚Äôd like to create annotations for different purposes.
  • Click on the delete button to delete an annotation (the numbers will update auto-magically).
  • You can also use markdown for formatting your annotation description:

**Bold**

_Italics_

Underlined

~Strikethrough~

Links

- Unordered List

1. Ordered List

--- Divider

  • Click on the edit button to rename your frame group (does not rename the original frame name)
  • To create annotations on other frame(s):

Select another frame on your Figma page

Click the ‚Äú+‚Äù button

  • To delete annotations from other frame(s):

Select the frame group from the plugin

Click the ‚Äútrash‚Äù button to delete all the annotations

from that frame (this action cannot be undone)

  • To hide annotations from a page: Click on the hide button (next to Frames title in the sidebar)
  • To show hidden annotations on a page: Click on the show button (next to the show button)

‚Äî


Limitations

The current version of the plugin does not yet support:

  • Better link integration


The Plugin was Crafted & Designed by @sonaliagrawal, and Developed by @madebyfabian.


For more info:

https://annotate-it.co


‚Äî


If you have any ideas for features, issues or perhaps ways to improve the plugin, we would love to hear from you via the Feedback Button inside the Plugin, via Twitter (@sonaliagrawal), or via Email (support@annotate-it.co).


Made with ‚ô• in Dallas, Texas & Nuremberg, Germany.

plugins.name: Bubblecons Icons by Iconduck
plugins.description:
Bubblecons Nations Icon Set is an icon library of 600 icons. It's been open sourced with a custom open source license. All icons can be used for personal & commercial purposes.


This library bridges the gap between icons and illustrations. You'll notice detail in these icons that go beyond most icon libraries, including:

  • Smaller shapes
  • Decoration around icons
  • High-fidelity details


The icons are focused on the following categories:

  • Travel
  • Spain / spanish theme icons
  • Includes many flags
  • Includes black & white and color icons
  • Bright icons, with a focus on orange tinted designs
  • Food and music themed icons


It's powered by Iconduck.


Plugin features:

  • Drag and drop any icons or emojis
  • Search through them all instantly
  • Click any icon to add it your design


Coming soon:

  • Save your favorite icons
  • View your search history
  • View your embed history

plugins.name: Material palette
plugins.description:
Create color palettes for your designs.


Features:

Select a schema:

* Material ‚Äì Material palette schema

* Linear ‚Äì A stable, linear palette


Change the look of the palette in the Settings tab:

* Change the alignment, width and height the palette.

* Show an outline around your base color

* Lock all, none or just the swatch nodes

* Toggle the header node


Each schema comes with extra options to help you find the optimal palette.


Drag, zoom and scroll the demo palette if need be.


Each swatch will open a color picker when clicked, allowing for fine tuning of the palette.


All settings are saved when you create a palette. These can be reset in the "Settings" tab.


https://github.com/Leolainen/figma-plugin-Material-palette

plugins.name: Text Prettier
plugins.description:
TextPrettier Plugin: Enhance Your Typography with Ease


This tool is designed to improve your typography and helps you make your text legible and visually pleasing when showcased



How to use TextPrettier:

‚Äî Select one or more text layers in your artboard

‚Äî Run the plugin from Plugins ‚Üí TextPrettier or click on your own hotkey

‚Äî Now your text is awesome



What plugin can fix in your text:

‚Ä¢ Non-breaking spaces (nbsp symbol) as needed.

‚Ä¢ Correct usage of dashes and em dashes (‚Äî).

‚Ä¢ Proper handling of quotes.

‚Ä¢ Implementation of hanging punctuation (or pretexts).

‚Ä¢ Removal of trailing commas and blanks.

‚Ä¢ Elimination of double punctuation and unnecessary spaces.

‚Ä¢ Apostrophe adjustments.

‚Ä¢ Symbol refinement.

‚Ä¢ Formatting of numbers with multiple digits (divided into groups of three).

‚Ä¢ Consistent date format.

‚Ä¢ Currency formatting (for roubles / rur).

‚Ä¢ Standardized phone number format.

‚Ä¢ Accurate representation of math signs, fractions, and pow.

‚Ä¢ And more!


Make your text impeccable and polished with TextPrettier. For any questions or feedback, reach out to our support team.

  • Customization options - stroke, size, set, and color;
  • Easy preview on Figma Community;

plugins.name: Master
plugins.description:
Create, attach, clone and move components in a couple of clicks without losing overrides! üî• Introductory video (5 min.) üëæ Interactive guide (15 min.) üìï Plugin docs


‚Üí Learn more and get the license

Free trial: You can successfully use the plugin up to five times per file.


üí¨ Feedback and questions are welcome: gleb@dominate.design


‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî


‚ùñ Started a new project in Figma and realized you should've used Components instead of Frames too late? ü§¨ Master plugin allows you to create new component from a set of any objects (and save all overrides):


1. Select any number of similar objects in your Figma file.

2. Run the Master plugin command ‚ÄúCreate Component from Objects‚Äù

3. The new main Component will be created

4. Selected objects will become its Instances with all possible overrides applied!


‚ùñ Also Master would help you ‚Äúattach‚Äù objects of any kind to the existing Component, even if it is in another file:


1. Select one Instance or Component. Run ‚ÄúPick Target Component‚Äù command, the plugin will remember selected Component.

2. Select Instances or other objects you want to turn into Instances of the saved Component.

3. Run the command called ‚ÄúLink Objects to Target Component‚Äù.

4. All objects will be replaced with Instances of the previously selected Component, keeping overrides where possible.


For more extensive documentation visit https://dominate.design/docs


‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî


‚ùñ When to use Master plugin

‚Ä¢ When you have created several copies of one Frame or Group for exploration and need to turn them into one Component.

‚Ä¢ When realize you should have used Instances of one Component instead of regular objects too late.

‚Ä¢ If you want to create a new master Component for a bunch of existing Instances (clone component).

‚Ä¢ To create different versions of one component for different layouts or screen sizes.

‚Ä¢ You want to create a local copy of a Component, Instances of which were imported from Team Library.

‚Ä¢ If you need to quickly get the ability to manipulate multiple similar objects at once.

‚Ä¢ Create new Master Component and put it to the side while keeping the Instance in place.

‚Ä¢ If you create art with repeating parts and want change them all at once.

‚Ä¢ When you want to ‚ÄúSmart Animate‚Äù one Component into another one.

‚Ä¢ Your Instance was detached from Master Component when copying to another file? Reattach it with Master plugin.

‚Ä¢ When you want to copy components to another file and they get detached.

‚Ä¢ To avoid fixing issues with the components imported from Sketch manually.

‚Ä¢ You used Blend plugin on an object and want to change all the copies at once.


‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî


‚ùñ Technical info

‚Ä¢ Selection can include Frames, Groups and Instances of other components. All of them should have similar sets of elements in them. Objects which have different structures will be ignored. Alternatively you can select a bunch of layers of the same type, like texts, ellipses or rectangles.


‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî


‚ùñ About license

Your license purchase means a lot to me as an indie developer! With the license purchase you will be able to use the plugin as much as you want, while free trial version is limited to five successful uses per file. There is no subscription, no cost of updates, no hidden fees!


Please don't share your license code with anyone. If you are purchasing limited licenses (1, 2, 4 or 8 users), only share the license code with that amount of people. If you have any questions regarding the purchase or need help/financial support, feel free to reach out and I'll do my best to find a solution for you!


‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî


‚ùñ Contact

Something is broken? Got feedback? Don't hesitate to send me an email!

‚Äî Gleb Sabirzyanov

plugins.name: Figma -> React Native
plugins.description:
Figma To React Native


Description


Transforms Figma components to React Native components in real time. The goal is to reduce the handoff time between design and development. Design your UI components in Figma and export them for use in your React Native app. The focus is on one way, continuous, conversion from Figma to React.


Getting Started


Run the plugin and select a Figma component. The plugin will generate React component code and render a preview. To change the settings, click the cog icon and edit the JSON. Settings will save and update in real-time. You can change the configuration of the editor, plugin, compiler, code output, and more.


Features


‚ú® Realtime code and preview rendering

üîß Flexible and realtime config

üé® Theme generation from styles

üì¶ Batch exporting of components and assets

üèû Asset exporting of rasters and vectors

‚≠êÔ∏è AutoLayout to Flexbox translation

üé≤ Variants and properties support

üß© Figma variables support

üß± Nested components support

üé≠ Conditional rendering

ü™ü Borders and rounding

üîÑ Rotations and effects

üìö Storybook syncing

üìñ JSDoc generation

üí° Dark/light mode

  1. Discord Channel
  2. Source Code
  3. Discussions
  4. Issues
